body_html: Hey @jaechanglim , sorry for the late reply. I don't think you can, but I stand to be corrected. I tried to look trough the code and it looks like it uses same context if there is already one existing but there is no way to pass the cuda stream.
body_text: Hey @jaechanglim , sorry for the late reply. I don't think you can, but I stand to be corrected. I tried to look trough the code and it looks like it uses same context if there is already one existing but there is no way to pass the cuda stream.
body: Hey @jaechanglim , sorry for the late reply. I don't think you can, but I stand to be corrected. I tried to look trough the code and it looks like it uses same context if there is already one existing but there is no way to pass the cuda stream.
